name: Avatar Space Fight
description:
You fight as a banshee trying to protect your home planet, Pandora, from the human and alien colonizers, fight off the ships with your fireballs. 

This is my first game so critique will be appreciated and all these images are not owned by me and were taken from Google, also this is meant to be practice not to be monetized so don't sue me for taking your images.

Headphones are advised
